channel.title: Java errors are retarded!
channel.description:
Hey peoples$%@#$%@$#%@ Well I am here posting today. Btw i learned how to post =] Okay so w.e. I need help. My Java isnt running correctly apparently. I want to sign in to the original Runescape by Jagex and the screen turns white saying: "Error click for details". I click and then all these weird numbers and letters pop out. Check it out
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_14 Using JRE version 1.6.0_14-b08 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Users\Samy ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
load: class loader.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://world86.runescape.com/loader/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class load: class loader.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://world38.runescape.com/loader/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class
I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT THAT MEANS If a Techy guy can help me thatd be really awesome. I tried contacting Java but those money hungry freaks demand cash and I have non. I'm on 14 gosh darn it. So yea, if someone can help me I'd be really greatfull.
P.S. ---TO SAVE YOU GUYS SOME TROUBLE---
* I already re downloaded Java... * I already checked if it was my web browser and no I used 5 browsers and nothing... * I already checked if I had Java enabled... NOTHING WORKED
So If you guys can help me thatd be really awesome :D

item.title: Java errors are retarded!
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/ClassNotFoundException.html”]public class ClassNotFoundException
extends Exception
Thrown when an application tries to load in a class through its string name using:

The forName method in class Class.
The findSystemClass method in class ClassLoader .
The loadClass method in class ClassLoader.
but no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.[/quote]
QFT.

Read full topic

item.title: Java errors are retarded!
item.dc:creator: @Anthem Anthem
item.description:
@Anthem wrote:

post in server help this isnt a general question…

o wait this isnt server, sorry. i dunno what i can do with that error

Read full topic

item.title: Java errors are retarded!
item.dc:creator: @Sammamma Sammamma
item.description:
@Sammamma wrote:

Hey peoples$%@#$%@$#%@
Well I am here posting today. Btw i learned how to post =]
Okay so w.e. I need help.
My Java isnt running correctly apparently.
I want to sign in to the original Runescape by Jagex and the screen turns white saying:
“Error click for details”. I click and then all these weird numbers and letters pop out.
